statements: SELECT * FROM algorithm_specific_rules;
SELECT rule_name, condition FROM algorithm_specific_rules ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM algorithm_specific_rules WHERE condition = 'greater_than';
SELECT id, rule_name FROM algorithm_specific_rules WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT condition FROM algorithm_specific_rules ORDER BY condition DESC;
SELECT * FROM algorithm_specific_rules;
SELECT id, rule_name FROM algorithm_specific_rules WHERE condition = 'high';
SELECT * FROM algorithm_specific_rules WHERE rule_name LIKE '%specific%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, rule_name, condition FROM algorithm_specific_rules WHERE condition IN ('high','low') ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT id, rule_name, condition FROM algorithm_specific_rules WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY id ASC, rule_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders JOIN Products ON Orders.order_id = Products.product_id WHERE total_amount > price
SELECT * FROM AlgorithmRules;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM AlgorithmRules;
SELECT sample_id, input_data, output_data FROM DataSamples WHERE rule_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RuleParameters ORDER BY parameter_id DESC;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM AlgorithmRules WHERE rule_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM AlgorithmRules WHERE rule_id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM AlgorithmRules WHERE rule_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM AlgorithmRules WHERE rule_name LIKE '%name%';
SELECT rule_name, condition_query FROM AlgorithmRules WHERE rule_id > 2 ORDER BY rule_name DESC;
SELECT rule_name, COUNT(rule_id) AS rule_count FROM AlgorithmRules GROUP BY rule_name;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT ship_date, status FROM Shipping WHERE status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY ship_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM Orders INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers WHERE email IS NULL OR email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT user_id, post_content FROM Posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT comment_text FROM Comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT follower_user_id, follow_date FROM Followers ORDER BY follow_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE age < 30 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, p.post_content, c.comment_text FROM Users u JOIN Posts p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN Comments c ON p.post_id = c.post_id;
SELECT p.post_id, COUNT(l.user_id) AS total_likes FROM Posts p LEFT JOIN Likes l ON p.post_id = l.post_id GROUP BY p.post_id HAVING total_likes > 5 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(f.follower_user_id) AS total_followers FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Followers f ON u.user_id = f.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
